alert.note: Alert for Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 3:37PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A modest thunderstorm near Henry moving northeast toward Blackfoot Reservoir and Palisades through 445 PM MDT... At 334 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a modest thunderstorm near Henry, or 7 miles southeast of Blackfoot Reservoir, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, brief moderate rain, and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wayan, southern Palisades Reservoir, southern Blackfoot Reservoir, Henry, Mill Canyon Campground and Grays Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If you are on Blackfoot Reservoir or Palisades, you should consider moving to shore until the storm passes.
